/opt/app/state.description: Choose a Share for SubSonic configuration. Eg: create a Share called subsonic-config for this purpose alone.
/opt/app/state.label: Config Storage

/mnt/music.description: Choose a Share for SubSonic's music library (your media). Eg: create a Share called subsonic-music for this purpose alone. You can also assign other media Shares on the system after installation.
/mnt/music.label: Music Storage

SUBSONIC_UID.description: Enter a valid UID to run Plex with. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
SUBSONIC_UID.label: UID

SUBSONIC_GID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
SUBSONIC_GID.label: GID

Subsonic.description: Subsonic. Your complete, personal media streamer.
